name: The Unfamiliar Story of Grandfather's Heritage
name_original: The Unfamiliar Story of Grandfather's Heritage
description:
Mona, whose financial situation is in trouble, sets out to sell her grandfather's house and factory to pay off her debts. When she gets there, she realizes that ghosts from the past are waiting for her. Unwittingly she will reveal a secret that was buried years ago.

This game is a first person thriller game. You will explore the vast secret places and unravel dark secrets of the family's past with mature storytelling. The dark places in the game will increase your level of fear. You have to collect all the clues and follow the signs to solve the mystery. And eventually you will have to make a decision.


Hello everyone! Firstly, I am not a game developer. One day my 6-year-old son asked me to make a video game for him. So I rolled up my sleeves and got to work This game is my first project. If the results will be good, more will come.
